title: List Players
name: RetrievePlayers
description: Retrieves a paginated list of players ordered by their pseudo (in alphabetical order) with optional filters.

URL query parameters.description: Select only the players with the specified gender.
Select only the players with the specified age.
The number of elements to retrieve in one page (defaults to 100)

examples.title: 200 OK
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
   Content-Type: application/json
   Link: <https://e-sport-dev.herokuapp.com/api/player?gender=male&age=26&page=2&pageSize=30; rel="first prev"

[
  {
      "_id": "5dc2ea214d7a71492043832d",
      "firstName": "Lucien",
      "lastName": "Pochon",
      "pseudo": "LPN",
      "birthDate": "1993-07-17T02:24:00.000Z",
      "picture": "https://picture",
      "gender": "male",
      "createdAt": "2019-11-06T15:43:29.890Z",
      "__v": 0
  },
  {
      "_id": "5dc19f3943779a32c4f0fbb4",
      "firstName": "Adrien",
      "lastName": "Lestuzzi",
      "pseudo": "ADL",
      "birthDate": "1993-04-17T02:24:00.000Z",
      "picture": "https://picture",
      "gender": "male",
      "createdAt": "2019-11-05T16:11:37.988Z",
      "__v": 0
  }
]
